entry.title: Adding New BIP Editors
entry.summary: Within a recent exchange on the Bitcoin Development Mailing List, there was a notable discussion regarding the addition of new Bitcoin Improvement Proposal (BIP) editors. A key point raised was the suggestion that Luke Dashjr, a prominent figure in the community, should be responsible for selecting these new editors. This suggestion comes in light of Luke Dashjr having previously made a call for applications for these positions. The discourse emphasizes the significance of this selection process and implicitly trusts Luke Dashjr's judgment and familiarity with the needs of the community in making these appointments. The conversation underscores the importance of the roles being filled and the confidence placed in Luke Dashjr to identify individuals who will effectively contribute to the development and improvement of Bitcoin.
